message.content: {"task_id":"equities_research_simple_001","user_prompt":"Retrieve the latest news articles and current stock price for Apple Inc. (AAPL).","complexity":"simple","max_turns":3,"tools_available":["polygon_get_aggs","polygon_get_news","fmp_get_quote","fmp_get_company_profile","tavily_search"],"limits":{"max_tools":3,"max_servers":1},"tool_sequence":[{"step":1,"server":"polygon","tool":"polygon_get_news","params":{"ticker":"AAPL","limit":5},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["articles = results[]"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["len(articles) > 0"],"next_args_from":""}},{"step":2,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_quote","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["price","volume","changesPercentage"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["price is not None","volume > 0"],"next_args_from":""}},{"step":3,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_company_profile","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["description","industry","sector"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["description is not None"],"next_args_from":""}}],"final_answer_requirements":{"format":"markdown","must_include":["latest news articles","current stock price","company description","industry","sector"],"grounded_from":["articles","price","description","industry","sector"],"quality_criteria":["no hallucinations","concise"]},"judge_rubric":{"weights":{"coverage":0.4,"grounding":0.4,"clarity":0.2,"safety":0.0},"target_length_range":[50,150]}}
